name: Sunday Brunch: Dorie Greenspan's Puffy, Browned Pancake
description: When I made last week's silver dollar pancakes I never got to sit down with Will and Vicky to enjoy them fully. I was always bouncing up from the table to pour or turn the pancakes. What's the answer to...
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup milk, preferably at room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 425°F. Melt the butter in a 10-inch oven-proof skillet over medium heat, tilting the pan to coat the sides. Meanwhile, whisk together the milk, flour, sugar, eggs and nutmeg in a bowl until smooth.
